video_prompt: The crystalline castle shimmers as cascading waterfalls flow into the dynamic clouds below. Pink flora sways gently on the terraces, adding warm bursts of color. The entire structure appears to slowly drift through the vast, ethereal cloud sea under a perpetually clear sky.
image_prompt: "A breathtaking fantasy ice and crystal castle/city, intricately designed with Gothic/fantastical architecture, sharp spires, and cascading waterfalls. It floats amidst voluminous white clouds under a clear blue sky. Lush, vibrant pink flowering bushes and trees spill over terraces, adding warmth and softness. The scene exudes ethereal beauty, wonder, and a dreamlike quality."
refined_video_prompt: Castle surfaces shimmer. Waterfalls cascade, flowing into actively swirling clouds below. Flora sways gently on its terraces. The entire structure slowly drifts, causing the cloud sea to continuously shift and recede in the background.
